page.title: 19Cornton Vale Prison,Stirling
page.content:
This is the only{woman's prison}in the whole of Scotland. It is located in our area because it is central for big cities such as{Glasgow, Edinburgh,}and {Dundee.}These cities have higher crime rates. It is 10 years old and has 190 staff, 19 of whom are men. The prison can hold{190}inmates in single room accommodation. There are 5 main living blocks, 2 large workshops, an education unit, cookhouse, laundry, chapel, gym, and a large garden area.
All inmates are in full-time work in those places. The prison has its own earning scheme, but the pay is not very high. The inmate's day starts at {6.30am}and they are locked away at {9.30pm.}At the moment there are 155 inmates from 16 years upwards, most of the inmates are in the 25-35 years age group.
